alert.note: Alert for Thayer (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 25 at 6:34PM CST until December 26 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations up to one inch. * WHERE...Thayer County. * WHEN...Until 6 PM CST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Lingering, intermittent snow. Additional snow accumulations mainly up to 2 inches, the majority falling through Tuesday daytime. Northwest winds gusting 25 to 35 MPH into this evening, but decreasing to no more than 20 to 30 MPH most areas late tonight through Wednesday.
info.instruction: Plan on slippery road conditions for post-Christmas travel. Areas of blowing snow could reduce visibility before winds diminish. Visibilities may drop below 1 mile, mainly before midnight tonight.
